purpose: The email announces the first call for papers for the VMCAI 2026 conference, which will focus on verification, model checking, and abstract interpretation. It invites submissions of regular papers, tools papers, and case studies. The conference is scheduled to take place on January 12-13, 2026, in Rennes, France, and is co-located with POPL 2026. The submission deadline is set for September 10, 2025, with notifications to authors on November 6, 2025. Additional information can be found on the VMCAI 2026 website.

infos:
Subject: VMCAI 2026: first call for papers
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Wed, 16 Jul 2025 06:16:26 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
VMCAI 2026 will take place during January 12-13, 2026 as a physical
(in-person) event in Rennes, France, co-located with POPL 2026.
For more information, please visit the VMCAI 2026 website:

conf_name_candidates.evidence: VMCAI 2026 will take place during January 12-13, 2026 as a physical (in-person) event in Rennes, France, co-located with POPL 2026.
